translations: 扎染印花大手帕（等于 bandana）

sentences.sentence: They stood in their camouflage fatigues and bandannas in front of the flag of the al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigades.
sentences.translation: 他们穿着迷彩服，戴着大头巾，站在阿克萨烈士旅的旗帜前。

sentences.sentence: Some people who have hair loss choose not to wear wigs. Bandannas, hats or scarves may be worn to keep the head warm.
sentences.translation: 不打算佩戴假发的患者，可以佩戴头巾、帽子和围巾来保持头部的温暖。
